mapper.insert: insert into grouphub.movie(movieName, movieYear, description, totalRateNumber, totalRateScore) value (#{movieName}, #{movieYear}, #{description}, #{totalRateNumber}, #{totalRateScore});
mapper.select: select movieYear from grouphub.movie where movieName = #{movieName};
select count(movieName) from grouphub.movie where movieName = #{movieName};
